texts.header: Redeem your rewards for Home Services

gift.footer:
Do you have a question about your service request?
Call your Home Maintenance Concierge at 1-855-694-7868 or chat with your Concierge online
gift.message_label: When is the most convenient time(s) to complete this service?
gift.message_placeholder: Example: Monday, Thursday morning before 11 am
gift.title: Order

success.body: Your service request been successfully submitted! You will receive a phone call from your Home Serveces Concierge to schedule your service within the next business day, as well as a confirmation email.
success.footer:
Prefer to place your order over the phone?
Call your Home Maintenance Concierge at 1-855-694-7868 or chat with your Concierge online
success.title: Congratulations

error.body: An error occurred while receiving the gift.
error.title: Error
